name: West soup journey
description:
After a long day of travel, the urges to try a delicious campbell soup are inmense.

Lucky of you, the nearest town you are passing by has a 7 horses store open right now...

Will they have campbell soup?

Made for Paint Jam 2021.

Other information

Our first visual novel made with Ren'Py 7.4.4.

The macOS build has not been tested, so feedback would be appreciated and we hope it works well for you.  :)
